EmbedStructure.description: Hi! I'm Thomas, a 22 year old English and Creative Writing grad from the UK (easy to miss, because I don't sleep) I am currently the Jeskai councillor here and code the colour pie bot! Nice to meet you!
EmbedStructure.title: Tinny's Profile

reps: For being the best server owner this side of the Mississippi

fields.name: What colors am I?
fields.value: I think I’m Esper, but I’m not entirely sure. I know my color order is <:5wm:719986148453384192> > <:5um:719986148235018291> > <:5bm:719986148692197527> > <:5gm:719986148448927744> > <:5rm:719986148474355722>, but the cut off is up in the air. I’ve been methodically refining my colors for more than a year, but I’m procrastinating on finishing that up.

fields.name: What’s my chromatic affiliation?
fields.value: I tend to adhere to Maro’s writings as a color pie lingua franca, but I have an idea for a color pie based solely on the 3-word ideologies that I’ve been procrastinating on.

fields.name: Am I in any secret pacts?
fields.value: Yes, but they wouldn’t be a secret if I told you what they were.

fields.name: Am I in any public pacts?
fields.value: Yes, I’m in the Order of the Banhammer with Other Will, an organization dedicated to enforcing rules upon the server. Ping either of us if you’d like the rules of the organization or would like to join.

fields.name: Is there anything I left out of my description to make that clone joke?
fields.value: Yes, quite a bit actually. I’ll put it all here because I ran out of question slots. I’m a mod here and the owner of the sub. I joined the server very early on. I don’t actually play Magic, I just got here because I really like #typology systems and reddit decided I’d like the color pie. In those various typing systems I’m an ENTP, Ravenclaw primary/Slytherin secondary, Authleft, and 1w9, though I haven’t looked into Enneagram much. I live in Montana, though I’m not sure why you’d care. I have a Boros mom, a Sultai dad, and a Rakdos little brother. I’m almost the youngest member, but I think Will is slightly younger. My hobbies are mostly just learning stuff on the internet, with me occasionally learning things IRL. Oh, and I’ve done Debate and Drama before, plus Yearbook and Fun Facts Club, the latter of which I founded and is exactly what it sounds like. Oh, and I really don’t like red.

EmbedStructure.description: Hello! I’m Mucus Patty. I could prbably write a description of my own, but you can just read Other Will’s, given we’re pretty much clones of each other.
EmbedStructure.title: Mucus Patty

fields.name: Color Identity
fields.value: I am honored to be the Grixis counselor here on this server, and my color identity falls somewhere within Artifice, depending on who you ask.

fields.name: Preferred Format
fields.value: EDH is the only good choice. Plus, the only one I play.

fields.name: Hobbies
fields.value: Kinda already explained this in my intro, but: scheming, gathering random data to make graphs and charts, making robots, warhammer, mtg, hanging out with friends, the occasional illicit activity.

fields.name: Contact
fields.value: Feel free to ping me/talk to me about pretty much anything. I'll probably answer, and if I'm not interested I'll just ignore it.

fields.name: Ambitions
fields.value: I'm unironically obsessed with immortality, and even if I can't quite get there I hope my work will benefit humanity's scientific progress.

EmbedStructure.description: Greetings, puny mortals. I am Shrike, lord of extropy, aspiring immortalist, and herald of your salvation. But fr yo I'm a 17-year-old high school student that lives in Texas but schemes to gtfo for college where I plan to study biotechnology. I work for the city as a counselor for a summer camp, I enjoy nerd shit like Warhammer and MtG, and I love working with my district robotics team to fund, machine, build, and repair robots. I break laws and collect random data for fun and absolutely can't stand isolation, so on the few occasions I'm not hanging out with friends or with other people for some reason or another, I'm probably talking to people online -and this server is my favorite place to do that!
EmbedStructure.title: Shrike

fields.name: Color identity
fields.value: Dimir / Esper / Grixis / Sultai

fields.name: Contributions
fields.value: I compiled the masterpost of Loreleywrites’ color analyses, which is available through <#696488842844438649> and hosted on Reddit.

fields.name: Hobbies
fields.value: Games (primarily Dead by Daylight), roleplaying, creative projects, consuming various entertainment media

fields.name: Favorite food
fields.value: Indian chicken curry, spicy foods

EmbedStructure.description: ***Creative Proficiencies:*** **Writing and language:** I earned my bachelor’s degree in Writing Studies. **Pencil and digital art:** I have been honing my drawing skills from a very early age. As a child, before I could read or write, I used to draw comic stories and then have adults write in the words I wanted characters to speak. **Video editing:** I began developing my skills in video editing once I started uploading gameplay footage as a hobby. My main accomplishment in this area is selling my services to popular YouTuber Otzdarva. I am credited in the description of his video “Otz & Tru3 discuss DBD,” for which I did all the editing. The uploaded video is exactly as I sent it to him. **Digital music:** I have dabbled in digital music, with mixed results. Some of which I’m very proud of. I’m primarily interested in it for the purposes of narrative accompaniment, such as video game music or character themes. I once made a game called “Creature from the Ashen Wood,” which is available free online.
EmbedStructure.title: State of Bedlam

fields.name: Colors
fields.value: I'm primarily Green/Blue but I dabble in the other colors occasionally.

fields.name: Preferred formats
fields.value: I mostly play EDH and cube, along with Modern and Legacy occasionally.

fields.name: View of the pie
fields.value: I have a pretty loose view of the pie, I think it has a lot of flexibility as a system but is generally centered around one's values, though that's certainly not all it can cover.

fields.name: Hobbies
fields.value: Music, writing, reading fantasy books, studying people, traveling

fields.name: Typology stuff
fields.value: Sexual 5 (w4), 592 tritype, INTP, LII-3Ne

fields.name: MTG Colors
fields.value: Green, stretching out to the borders of Naya

fields.name: IRL Facts
fields.value: Trans man, 29 y/o, 152cm, omnisexual, polyamorous, multiple system, oldest of 8 kids, living in Portland Oregon USA, ADHD, loves snuggles

fields.name: Favorite Things
fields.value: Pumpkin Pie, Teal, Dogs, the number 11, Gallade, snuggles, Autumn, Fairies, Hozier, *No Game No Life*, *HPMOR*, Blades In The Dark, Bard (Glamour), Eggs Over-Medium

fields.name: DMs?
fields.value: Always Open. I love making new friends. Talk to me about your worldbuilding project!

fields.name: My Dog
fields.value: Calcifur is a 2~ y/o Havanese/Poodle. He was gifted to me by a neighbor who wasn't equipped to deal with his anxiety and behavioral issues. His colors are White>Red.

fields.name: ʙᴀsɪᴄs
fields.value: i am 24 as of november 8th, something resembling a demiboy gender-wise {he/they/it}, heavily neurodivergent, and i live with questionable-to-terrible parents in the greater toronto area

fields.name: ᴄᴏʟᴏᴜʀs
fields.value: i'm blue. that's about it! people are split on whether or not white or black is my secondary. i have negligible amounts of green and red. also i spell it colour because i've got canada
